body: Hi Mostapha  1. I am using  Ladybug.  I set the computer to 24 hours but I counted 23. I am missing one hour of the sun.  Why am I missing one hour? 2. I reduced mesh on my igloo and run radiation. But now it has blue spots. How to fix it?
